text: Denklingen is a municipality in Landsberg (also called Landsberg am Lech) in Bavaria in Germany. The former municipality of Epfach, which has a history back to the Roman period, is now part of Denklingen. ==Geography== Denklingen is the most southwesterly municipality in Landsberg. It is on flats to the west of the Lech River. It is at the edge of Denklinger Rotwalds (red forest of Denklingen) and Sachsenrieder forest. ==References== Category:Landsberg (district)
title: Denklingen
